native_answer: Si están riendo, debe ser un buen chiste.
prompt: If they're ______, it must be a good joke.
answer: If they're laughing, it must be a good joke.
audio_dir: If they're laughing, it must be a good joke.

native_answer: Si están jugando afuera, deben estar disfrutando del buen clima.
prompt: If they're ______ outside, they must be enjoying the nice weather.
answer: If they're playing outside, they must be enjoying the nice weather.
audio_dir: If they're playing outside, they must be enjoying the nice weather.

native_answer: Si está tirando de la cuerda, probablemente esté tratando de mover algo pesado.
prompt: If he's ______ on the rope, he's probably trying to move something heavy.
answer: If he's pulling on the rope, he's probably trying to move something heavy.
audio_dir: If he's pulling on the rope, he's probably trying to move something heavy.

native_answer: El chef cocinando la cena es muy hábil.
prompt: The chef ______ dinner is very skilled.
answer: The chef cooking dinner is very skilled.
audio_dir: The chef cooking dinner is very skilled.

native_answer: El bebé llorando en la habitación de al lado necesita atención.
prompt: The baby ______ in the next room needs attention.
answer: The baby crying in the next room needs attention.
audio_dir: The baby crying in the next room needs attention.

native_answer: La pareja bailando en la pista de baile parecía feliz.
prompt: The couple ______ on the dance floor looked happy.
answer: The couple dancing on the dance floor looked happy.
audio_dir: The couple dancing on the dance floor looked happy.

native_answer: La persona tomando café en el café es mi amigo.
prompt: The person ______ coffee at the café is my friend.
answer: The person drinking coffee at the café is my friend.
audio_dir: The person drinking coffee at the café is my friend.

native_answer: El conductor conduciendo el autobús era experimentado.
prompt: The driver ______ the bus was experienced.
answer: The driver driving the bus was experienced.
audio_dir: The driver driving the bus was experienced.

native_answer: Ella estaba cocinando la cena cuando llegué.
prompt: She was ______ dinner when I arrived.
answer: She was cooking dinner when I arrived.
audio_dir: She was cooking dinner when I arrived.

native_answer: El bebé lloraba ruidosamente en la habitación de al lado.

answer: The baby was crying loudly in the next room.
audio_dir: The baby was crying loudly in the next room.

native_answer: Ellos estaban bailando juntos en la fiesta.
prompt: They were ______ together at the party.
answer: They were dancing together at the party.
audio_dir: They were dancing together at the party.

native_answer: Él estaba bebiendo agua para saciar su sed.
prompt: He was ______ water to quench his thirst.
answer: He was drinking water to quench his thirst.
audio_dir: He was drinking water to quench his thirst.

native_answer: Ella conducía cuidadosamente por la carretera sinuosa.
prompt: She was ______ carefully along the winding road.

audio_dir: She was driving carefully along the winding road.

native_answer: Nosotros estábamos almorzando cuando sonó el teléfono.
prompt: We were ______ lunch when the phone rang.
answer: We were eating lunch when the phone rang.
audio_dir: We were eating lunch when the phone rang.

native_answer: Las hojas estaban cayendo de los árboles en otoño.
prompt: The leaves were ______ from the trees in autumn.
answer: The leaves were falling from the trees in autumn.
audio_dir: The leaves were falling from the trees in autumn.

native_answer: Los niños estaban saltando en el trampolín en el patio trasero.
prompt: The kids were ______ on the trampoline in the backyard.
